channel.title: Comments on: Sleepless in Seattle
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Do what I did: start one! I started Board 'N Brews about 2 years ago and now we have about 30-40 regulars.
item.content:encoded: Do what I did: start one! I started Board ‘N Brews about 2 years ago and now we have about 30-40 regulars.

item.title: By: Gem
item.dc:creator: Gem
item.description: You go to a board games group, that's amazing. Need to find one of those, stat.
item.content:encoded: You go to a board games group, that’s amazing. Need to find one of those, stat.

item.title: By: Kris
item.dc:creator: Kris
item.description: I'm looking forward to your hearing about your quest's adventures; I'm sure there will be some amusing stories along the way. Particularly if you decide to give on-line dating another go...
item.content:encoded: I’m looking forward to your hearing about your quest’s adventures; I’m sure there will be some amusing stories along the way. Particularly if you decide to give on-line dating another go…

item.title: By: brandon m. watson
item.dc:creator: brandon m. watson
item.description: val kilmner and the little guy, though i,m sure buffy was great as well...
item.content:encoded: val kilmner and the little guy, though i,m sure buffy was great as well…

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Thank you! Like Willow from Buffy the Vampire Slayer or Willow the guy from the fantasy film?
item.content:encoded: Thank you! Like Willow from Buffy the Vampire Slayer or Willow the guy from the fantasy film?

item.title: By: brandon m. watson
item.dc:creator: brandon m. watson
item.description: looking at your artwork i heard the words of "willow" echo through my mind... you are great! I'm finally o.k. praise God. i pray ur well. my #'s [removed for privacy]
item.content:encoded: looking at your artwork i heard the words of “willow” echo through my mind… you are great! I’m finally o.k. praise God. i pray ur well. my #’s [removed for privacy]
